front.title: Considerations for Selecting RTCP Extended Report (XR) Metrics for the RTCWEB Statistics API

abstract.t: This document describes monitoring features related to RTCWEB. It provides a list of RTCP XR metrics, which are useful and may need to be supported in some RTCWEB implementations. It also describes a list of additional identifiers for WebRTC's statistics API. These identifiers are a set of RTCP XR metrics related to the transport of multimedia flows.
